mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (SEQ, HOSPITAL_SEQ, USER_EMAIL,PET_NAME , RESERVETYPE, REGDATE, RESERVEDATE, RESERVETIME ,STATUS, PAYNUM) VALUES (RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{hospital_seq},#{user_email},#{pet_name},#{reservetype}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{reservedate},'YYYYMMDD'),#{reservetime},'S',#{paynum})
mapper.select: SELECT r1.SEQ, (SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =r1.RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE, r1.PET_NAME, h.NAME ,TO_CHAR(r1.RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE,r1.STATUS, r1.HOSPITAL_SEQ FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN (SELECT r.SEQ, RESERVETYPE ,r.PET_NAME ,r.RESERVEDATE ,r.STATUS, r.HOSPITAL_SEQ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RESERVEDATE DESC) AS RN FROM RESERVATION r WHERE r.USER_EMAIL = #{user_email}) r1 ON h.SEQ = r1.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN (SELECT r.SEQ, (SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =r.RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE ,r.PET_NAME ,r.RESERVEDATE ,r.STATUS, r.HOSPITAL_SEQ FROM RESERVATION r WHERE r.USER_EMAIL = #{user_email}) r1 ON h.SEQ = r1.HOSPITAL_SEQ ORDER BY r1.RESERVEDATE DESC

SELECT SEQ, r1.USER_EAMIL ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =r1.RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE ,TO_CHAR(r1.RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE ,r1.RESERVETIME , r1.PET_NAME ,r1.PAYNUM ,r1.STATUS, h.NAME ,r1.COMMNET ,h.ADDRESS1 FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN (SELECT r.RESERVETYPE , r.RESERVEDATE ,r.RESERVETIME , r.PET_NAME ,r.PAYNUM ,r.STATUS, r.COMMNET ,r.HOSPITAL_SEQ FROM RESERVATION r WHERE r.USER_EMAIL =#{user_email} AND r.STATUS ='R' AND r.SEQ =#{seq}) r1 ON h.SEQ = r1.HOSPITAL_SEQ

SELECT r1.SEQ, r1.USER_EMAIL, (SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =r1.RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE , TO_CHAR(r1.RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE ,r1.RESERVETIME , r1.PET_NAME ,r1.PAYNUM ,r1.STATUS, h.NAME ,h.ADDRESS1, r1.COMMNET FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN (SELECT r.SEQ, r.USER_EMAIL, r.RESERVETYPE , r.RESERVEDATE ,r.RESERVETIME , r.PET_NAME ,r.PAYNUM ,r.STATUS, r.HOSPITAL_SEQ, r.COMMNET FROM RESERVATION r WHERE r.USER_EMAIL = #{user_email} AND r.SEQ =#{seq}) r1 ON h.SEQ = r1.HOSPITAL_SEQ

SELECT HOSPITAL_SEQ ,SEQ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE,u.NAME ,u.EMAIL ,u.PHONE ,PET_NAME ,TO_CHAR(RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE , RESERVETIME FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON RESERVEDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE u.EMAIL = r.USER_EMAIL AND HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{seq}

SELECT ru.HOSPITAL_SEQ,SEQ,ru.RESERVETYPE,ru.NAME,ru.EMAIL,ru.PHONE,ru.PET_NAME,ru.RESERVEDATE,ru.STATUS , ru.RESERVETIME FROM (SELECT HOSPITAL_SEQ ,SEQ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE,u.NAME ,u.EMAIL ,u.PHONE ,PET_NAME ,TO_CHAR(RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE ,RESERVETIME, STATUS,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RESERVEDATE DESC) AS RN FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.USER_EMAIL = u.EMAIL WHERE HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{hospital_seq} AND r.STATUS != 'S') ru WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT HOSPITAL_SEQ ,SEQ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE,u.NAME ,u.EMAIL ,u.PHONE ,PET_NAME ,TO_CHAR(RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE ,RESERVETIME, STATUS FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.USER_EMAIL = u.EMAIL WHERE HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{hospital_seq} AND r.STATUS = 'A'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.USER_EMAIL = u.EMAIL AND HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{hospital_seq} AND r.STATUS != 'S' ORDER BY RESERVEDATE DESC

SELECT ru.HOSPITAL_SEQ,SEQ,ru.RESERVETYPE,ru.NAME,ru.EMAIL,ru.PHONE,ru.PET_NAME,ru.RESERVEDATE,ru.STATUS,ru.RESERVETIME FROM (SELECT HOSPITAL_SEQ ,SEQ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODEID =RESERVETYPE) AS RESERVETYPE,u.NAME ,u.EMAIL ,u.PHONE ,PET_NAME ,TO_CHAR(RESERVEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVEDATE ,RESERVETIME, STATUS,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RESERVEDATE DESC) AS RN FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.USER_EMAIL = u.EMAIL WHERE HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{hospital_seq} AND r.STATUS = 'S') ru WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERINFO u JOIN RESERVATION r ON r.USER_EMAIL = u.EMAIL AND HOSPITAL_SEQ =#{hospital_seq} AND r.STATUS ='S' ORDER BY RESERVEDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET STATUS = 'A' WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND PAYNUM IS NOT NULL AND STATUS='S'
